vote.title: Authorize a construction services contract for dredging of the pond located within Watercrest Park at Lake Highlands Town Center located at 7070 Skillman Street - Energy Resources, Inc., lowest responsible bidder of two - Not to exceed $2,800,700.00 - Financing: Flood Control (D) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Funds) ($1,600,000.00) and Skillman Corridor TIF District Fund ($1,200,700.00)
